tool_description: Returns data of current trend direction and trend strength for Forex Currency

title: Trend and Strength API for Forex ( GOLD/XAUUSD )

api_list.name: GET Latest Signal
api_list.description: Get the current trend direction of Forex GOLD
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trend-and-strength-api-for-forex-gold-xauusd.p.rapidapi.com/XAUUSD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trend-and-strength-api-for-forex-gold-xauusd.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
